description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. High quality match-4 puzzle game with unique gameplay and a lot of fun varieties. A "must try" for all the puzzle lovers.  CAMPAIGN: A fun category with a lot of variation. Includes several intriguing game modes, with solvable puzzles and increasing difficulty.  SCORE MODE: Survival gameplay, get the highest score possible.  PICTURE PUZZLE: Piece together an image by moving the blocks.
